data.title: University of Southern Mississippi
data.meta_description: Barry Davis (21) FB - 2014 (Freshman): Did not compete during the season, taking a redshirt. High School: Played at Columbia High School in Columbia, Miss. ....
data.text: 2014 (Freshman): Did not compete during the season, taking a redshirt. High School: Played at Columbia High School in Columbia, Miss. ... Helped the Wildcats to back-to-back playoff appearances as a junior and senior, winning the 2014 District 7 4A Championship ... Named First Team All-District as a junior and senior, as well as, being named Hattiesburg American All-Area Team ... Played in Texas vs. the World All-Star Game ... Also played basketball and baseball ... Helped CHS claim the State Championship in baseball in 2011 ... Honor student and member of the Beta Club. Personal: Full name is Barry Michael Davis ... Son of Sara and Mike Davis ... Has a younger brother, Reagan ... Father, Mike, played baseball at Southern Miss ... Born on April 9, 1996 in Columbia, Miss. ... Majoring in pre-law.
